InstructionData.Title: Thermostat v2
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Thermostat v2 # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias Heater1 d1 alias Heater2 d2 alias Led d3 alias Cooler1 d4 alias Cooler2 d5
define spinitial 25 define deadzone 1
alias device r0 alias maxtemp r1 alias mintemp r2 alias temp r3 alias sp r4 alias activate r5 alias color r6
start: add sp spinitial 273.15 add maxtemp sp deadzone sub mintemp sp deadzone
idle: yield move color 2 jal setcolor move activate 0 move device 1 jal on move device 4 jal on
l temp GasSensor Temperature s db Setting temp bgt temp maxtemp cooling blt temp mintemp heating j idle
cooling: yield move color 0 jal setcolor l temp GasSensor Temperature move activate 1 move device 4 jal on ble temp sp idle j cooling
heating: yield move color 4 jal setcolor l temp GasSensor Temperature move activate 1 move device 1 jal on bge temp sp idle j heating
on: brdns dr0 2 s dr0 On activate add device device 1 brdns dr0 2 s dr0 On activate j ra
setcolor: brdns Led 3 s Led On 1 s Led Color color j ra
